form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: LỘI KHAI HUU THE CUA NGƯỜI TY NAN XIN NÂP CÁNH HOÀ KÝ, 60

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/21/2023 BO TU PHAP HOA KY so DI TRU VA NHAP TIEH LOI KHAI HUU THE CUA NGUOI TY NAN XIN NHAP CANH HOA KY Ten: NGUYEN THE BACH CHI Tuoi: 60 UNG VIEN PHAI KHAI LA DU DIEU KIEN DE NHAP CANH VAO NUOC MY NGOAI TRU TRUONG HOP DUOC LUAT PHAP QUY DINH KHAC, NHUNG NGUOI THUOC CAC LOAI SAU DAY KHONG DUOC VAO HOA KY: Nhung Ngoai Kieu da pham phap va bi ket an vi mot trong toi ke' ca nhung toi pham thuoc pham vi luan ly (khong ke' cac vi pham luu thong nho nhat): nhung Ngoai Kieu da tham gia hoac CO y dinh tham gia hoat dong mai dâm; nhung Ngoai Kieu da tung hoac hien la nguoi chu truong va chinh phu, 1à doan vien hoac CO lien hê voi bat cu dang cong san hay doc tai nao, ke ca cac chi nhanh hoac chuc 1e thuoc lien he; nhung Ngoai Kieu da tung chu truong hoac qiang day, bang cach tu y phat bieu y kien hoac viet sach, bao, hoac gia nhap mot to chuc (i) chong doi Chinh Phu hop phap, (ii) lat ao' Chinh Phu bang vo 1uc, (iii) bao hanh hoac sat hai cac vien chic Chinh Phu vi chuc vi conq quyen cua ho, (iv) pha hoai bat hop phap cac tai san, (v) pha hoai hoac (vi) cac chu thuyet cong san the gioi, kcac viec thiet lap che do doc tài chuyen chê tai Hoa Ky; nhung goai Kieu, co y dinh tham gia cac hoat dong CO hai hoac bat hop phap CO tinh cach pha roi noi an; nhung Ngoai Kieu da bi ket an vi pham phap hoac vi pham luat le ve ma tuy, can sa hoac da buon lau ma tuy, can sa; nhung Ngoai Kieu lien he toi viec giup do' nhung nguoi Ngoai Kieu khac nhap canh Hoa Ky bat hop phap; nhung Ngoai Kieu da xin dac mien hoac xin rut khoi khoa huan luyen hoac quan vu thuoc Quan Luc Hoa Ky vi nai 1 x do Ngoai Kieu cua ho hoac da tung bi loai hoac sa thai khoi quan vu hoac cac khoa huan luyen do. Nhung Ngoai Kieu CO tri khon cham phat trien, dien khung, hoac da tung len con dien mdt hoac nhieu lan; Ngoai Kieu bi benh hoan tinh than, ham muon lech lac ve tinh duc, bi benh than kinh, nghien ma tuy, ngPien ruou, hoac mac benh truyen nhiem nguy hiem; nhung Ngoai Kieu bi bat tuc the chat, bi benh hoac tinh trang khicm khuyet CO anh huong toi kha nang muu sinh; nhung Ngoai Kieu thuoc loai du. thu du thuc, an xin chuyen nghiep hoac leu long; nhung Ngoai Kieu, da the hoac chu truong da the; nhung Ngoai Kieu da by tryc xuat khoi Hoa Ky trong nam qua, hoac da CO lan bi, truc xuat khoi Hoa Ky hoac da CO lan bj tong khil khoi Hoa voi ton phi do Chinh Phu chiu; nhung Ngoai Kieu da thu dac hoac tim cach the dac dau chieu khan bang cach gia mao, gian trai, nhung Ngoai Kieu rói khoi Hoa Ky hoac song 3 ngoai nubc My de' tron quan dich trong thoi chien hoac trong tinh trang
